caption:
b'A dot of yellow \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 1

At this grey time of the year, we might all be longing for a gleam of light, a ray of sun, a dot of yellow. We found some in our assets. Like the gas pipes in @OMVPetrom\xe2\x80\x99s onshore gas field \xe2\x80\x9cTotea Deep\xe2\x80\x9d in southwest Romania. 

#dotofyellow #OMV #OMVPetrom #ToteaDeep #Romania #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #gasfield #gaspipeline #winter #snow #ice #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'Oil is more than fuel \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 5

Crude oil is too valuable to be burned. That\xe2\x80\x99s why we refine it as material for high-end plastics. In the picture you see plastic pellets, produced by our subsidiary Borealis and then further processed into 
into different applications of our daily lives - from lightweight parts for the automotive industry to medical products. 

#OMV #BorealisGroup #downstream #petrochemicals #polyoleofins #plasticpellets #energy4betterlife #strongertogether #keepdiscovering #oilismorethanfuel #burnlessrefinemore'

b'Oil is more than fuel \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 4

In the picture to see an automotive wire. Such under-the-bonnet materials have a tough life. Parts located close to engines must withstand high temperatures. Our subsidiary Borealis is world-leader in manufacturing the high-tech plastics needed for flame retardant compounds developed as wiring solutions in automobiles. 

#OMV #BorealisGroup #downstream #petrochemicals #polyoleofins #automotive #energy4betterlife #strongertogether #keepdiscovering #oilismorethanfuel #oilismorethanfuel #burnlessrefinemore'

b'Oil is more than fuel \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 3

Have you ever wondered, how crude oil would facilitate electro mobility? To optimize the range of electric vehicles, it is crucial they are as light as possible. High-tech plastics from our subsidiary Borealis support lightweight construction and thus play an important role in enhancing energy efficiency. 

#OMV #BorealisGroup #downstream #petrochemicals #polyoleofins #automotive #energy4betterlife #strongertogether #keepdiscovering #oilismorethanfuel #oilismorethanfuel'

b'Oil is more than fuel \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 2

Did you know crude oil not only fuels your car, but is also found in a wide range of applications like bumpers, body panels, trims or door claddings as high-tech plastics? Our subsidiary Borealis is leading in the production of the needed raw materials and offers ideal replacements for conventional materials like metal, for example. 

#OMV #BorealisGroup #downstream #petrochemicals #polyoleofins #automotive #verhicle #energy4betterlife #strongertogether #keepdiscovering #oilismorethanfuel #burnlessrefinemore'

b'Oil is more than fuel \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 1

Crude oil comes in different forms. As plastics, it is a loyal companion in our daily lives. In the picture you see plastic pellets, produced by our subsidiary Borealis and then further processed into different applications \xe2\x80\x93 like parts for your car, for example. 

#OMV #BorealisGroup #downstream #petrochemicals #polyoleofins #automotive #plasticpellets #energy4betterlife #strongertogether #keepdiscovering #oilismorethanfuel #burnlessrefinemore'

b'Although most of Romanian oil fields are mature, we believe that there is still a lot untapped potential in deeper and more complex structures. The discovery of new fields and the development of these resources require the use of cutting edge technology, innovative teams and state of the art software solutions, such as deployed in the 3D Urziceni seismic survey, completed by OMV Petrom and Hunt Oil. \n\n#OMV #OMVPetrom #Urziceni #Romania #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #onshore #3DSeismic #seismicsurvey #seismicreflection #geology #geoscience #HuntOil #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'A seismic survey is comparable to  sonography in medicine. The largest onshore 3D seismic survey in Europe ever was done by @OMVPetrom and Hunt Oil in Romania earlier this year. Over 400 people and this fleet of vibrator vehicles were involved. \n\n#OMV #OMVPetrom #Urziceni #Romania #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #onshore #3DSeismic #seismicsurvey #seismicreflection #geology #geoscience #HuntOil #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'OMV Petrom and Hunt Oil have completed, in Romania, the largest onshore 3D seismic survey in Europe. These impulse generator vibrator vehicles generate deep sound pulses enabling carried out geophysical field measurements to identify potential hydrocarbon reservoirs in the area of Urziceni, Romania, earlier this year. \n\n#OMV #OMVPetrom #Urziceni #Romania #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #onshore #3DSeismic #seismicsurvey #seismicreflection #geology #geoscience #HuntOil #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'Steam Turbine at its best \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 6

We have a strong tradition of energy efficiency at OMV. Upgrading the steam turbines at our Schwechat Refinery is just one example of how we are making our operations more efficient and more environmentally friendly at the same time.

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Mannsw\xc3\xb6rth #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #refinery #downstream #CO2saving #energyefficiency #netzerooperations #Siemens #OMVandTheClimate #energy4betterlife'

b'Steam Turbine at its best \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 6

We have a strong tradition of energy efficiency at OMV. Upgrading the steam turbines at our Schwechat Refinery is just one example of how we are making our operations more efficient and more environmentally friendly at the same time.

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Mannsw\xc3\xb6rth #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #refinery #downstream #CO2saving #energyefficiency #netzerooperations #Siemens #OMVandTheClimate #energy4betterlife'

b'Steam Turbine at its best \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 5

Just like your regular service obligation for your car, we perform standard audits for the steam turbines at our Schwechat Refinery. Turbines are taken down, dismantled into their individual components, sent to the workshop, checked, brought back to the refinery, and then reassembled. This brings to light areas that would otherwise remain unseen. 

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Mannswo\xcc\x88rth #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #refinery #downstream #CO2saving #energyefficiency #netzerooperations #Siemens #OMVandTheClimate #energy4betterlife'

b'Steam Turbine at its best \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 4

The steam turbine in our Schwechat Refinery weighs 32 tons. During its turnaround, it was dismantled and the various parts were transported to two different Siemens workshops in Germany and Poland for inspection and upgrade.

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Mannsw\xc3\xb6rth #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #refinery #downstream #CO2saving #energyefficiency #netzerooperations #Siemens #OMVandTheClimate #energy4betterlife'

b'Steam Turbine at its best \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 3

By 2021, a total of three turbines will be modernized in our Schwechat Refinery \xe2\x80\x93 leading to CO2 savings of some 60,000 metric tons per year. Average per-capita emissions in Austria are around eight metric tons a year.

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Mannsw\xc3\xb6rth #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #refinery #downstream #CO2saving #energyefficiency #netzerooperations #Siemens #OMVandTheClimate #energy4betterlife'

b'Steam Turbine at its best \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 2

Here we see a stream turbine at our Schwechat Refinery. It produces electricity for the refinery and was recently upgraded in cooperation with Siemens. The modern geometry of the new turbine blades ensures better flow and thereby an increase in energy produced. 

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Mannsw\xc3\xb6rth #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #refinery #downstream #CO2saving #energyefficiency #netzerooperations #Siemens #OMVandTheClimate #energy4betterlife'

b'Steam Turbine at its best \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 1

This is part of a steam turbine in our Schwechat Refinery. In the course of a planned inspection, a technological advance was adopted: specially molded turbine blades that increase the efficiency and thereby save not only steam and costs but also CO2. 

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Mannsw\xc3\xb6rth #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #refinery #downstream #CO2saving #energyefficiency #netzerooperations #Siemens #OMVandTheClimate #energy4betterlife'

b'The OMV Innovation & Technology Center in G\xc3\xa4nserndorf is designed for large visitor groups. Starting with employees, current and future partners, and OMV stakeholders. An additional program is already being developed for universities and schools. At a later stage, the building should also open to a broader audience.\n\n#OMV #ITC #G\xc3\xa4nserndorf #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #innovation #technology #oilfieldphotography #architecture #energy4betterlife'

b'The OMV Innovation & Technology Center conforms to the highest standards of state-of-the-art presentation technology and exhibition architecture. Following a design and planning phase of around 18 months, construction began in fall 2018 and was finished at the beginning of 2020.\n\n#OMV #ITC #G\xc3\xa4nserndorf #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #innovation #technology #oilfieldphotography #architecture #energy4betterlife'

b'The OMV Innovation & Technology Center in G\xc3\xa4nserndorf explains and exhibits leading Upstream technologies. The main focus is on disciplines like Geology & Geophysics, Drilling Technology, Artificial Lift, Smart Oil Recovery, Materials & Corrosion, Saltwater Treatment, and Nanotechnology. \n\n#OMV #ITC #G\xc3\xa4nserndorf #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #innovation #technology #oilfieldphotography #architecture #energy4betterlife'

b'Innovation and technological advances have long been an integral part of our success and help OMV to produce an average of 487,000 barrels of oil equivalent per day worldwide. The OMV Innovation & Technology Center (ITC) in G\xc3\xa4nserndorf gives people an insight into these technological achievements.\n\n#OMV #ITC #G\xc3\xa4nserndorf #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #innovation #technology #oilfieldphotography #architecture #energy4betterlife'

b'Welcome to the ITC Innovation & Technology Center. It is located in the heart of OMV\xe2\x80\x99s production activities in G\xc3\xa4nserndorf, Lower Austria, where OMV has been active for over 6 decades. The center was built to showcase OMV\xe2\x80\x99s technological expertise and present technologies deployed by OMV using state-of-the-art visualization. \n\n#OMV #ITC #G\xc3\xa4nserndorf #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #innovation #technology #oilfieldphotography #architecture #energy4betterlife'

b'More than 6,000 fire extinguishers are dotted around the whole complex for use by the Schwechat Industrial Park Fire Brigade. Thankfully, they are mostly used for fire drills. Every full-time firefighter spends around 250 hours a year on training and safety exercises. \n\n#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Austria #refinery #firefighters #firebrigade #worksfirebrigade #fireextinguisher #Feuerwehr #Betriebsfeuerwehr #Feuerl\xc3\xb6scher #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #Man #energy4betterlife'

b'In the garage, the fire engines are our favorite. After all, even if it\xe2\x80\x99s crucial that everything works seamlessly in case of emergencies, it\xe2\x80\x99s even better if it never comes to that. That\xe2\x80\x99s why preventing fires is the top priority and why servicing and maintaining all of the equipment is one of the fire brigade\xe2\x80\x99s main jobs.\n\n#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Austria #refinery #firefighters #firebrigade #worksfirebrigade #fireextinguisher #Feuerwehr #Betriebsfeuerwehr #Feuerl\xc3\xb6scher #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #Man #energy4betterlife'

b'Prevention is better than cure! To prevent the occurrence of any major incident, more than 15,000 fire detectors are in use. And 40 kilometers of pipes and 500 hydrants guarantee that extinguishant is always available if the worst comes to the worst.\n \n#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Austria #refinery #firefighters #firebrigade #worksfirebrigade #firehose #hydrant #Feuerwehr #Betriebsfeuerwehr #L\xc3\xb6schschlauch #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #energy4betterlife'

b'This is a turbo extinguisher on a practice run at the Schwechat Refinery. It boasts two jet turbines, each with 5,000 hp, which disperse the water. It can spray up to 8,000 liters per minute onto the source of the fire in order to extinguish it.\n\n#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Austria #refinery #firefighters #firebrigade #worksfirebrigade #firetruck #Feuerwehr #Betriebsfeuerwehr #Lo\xcc\x88schfahrzeug #Turbolo\xcc\x88scher #Aerosolo\xcc\x88schfahrzeug #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #Man #energy4betterlife'

b'The fleet of the Schwechat Industrial Park Fire Brigade comprises 18 vehicles. The fire engine pictured has a huge pump with 1,600 hp that can spray up to 30,000 liters per minute. Impressive! \n\n#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Austria #refinery #firefighters #firebrigade #worksfirebrigade #firetruck #Feuerwehr #Betriebsfeuerwehr #L\xc3\xb6schfahrzeug #Wechselladeaufbau #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #Man #energy4betterlife'

b"Here we're on the grounds of the OMV Schwechat Refinery. The refinery is supported by 42 full-time and several hundred part-time firefighters, who are members of the Schwechat Industrial Park Fire Brigade. These highly trained firefighters are on standby 24/7 \xe2\x80\x93 and that's essential in case of any incident. As always, safety is the top priority! \n\n#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Austria #refinery #firefighters #firebrigade #worksfirebrigade #firetruck #Feuerwehr #Betriebsfeuerwehr #Betriebsfeuerwehr #Lo\xcc\x88schfahrzeug #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #Man #energy4betterlife"

b'Summer at OMV \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 6

Summertime is travel time. And that means high season for the refuellers at the airports. They fill up the planes before take-off \xe2\x80\x93 up to 250 a day in an average summer. 

#OMV #ViennaAirport #Vienna #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #kerosene #jet #jetfuel #airplane #aircraft #vacation #flight #summer #sunshine #sunbeam #sunray #energy4betterlife'

b'Summer at OMV \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 5

This tank is not particularly busy in summer. It stores kerosene, which sees a 50 percentincrease during peak travel season.  Experts call it the "sunkey". So, a kind of vacation period for our tank too. ;)

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #refinery #oiltank #tank #summer #sunshine #sunbeam #sunray #energy4betterlife'

b'Summer at OMV \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 4

The gleam of the pipes in the OMV ReOil unit in Schwechat is especially attractive when the sun catches them just right. Hardly surprising, as the unit is relatively new: it started up in 2018 \xe2\x80\x93 since when it has recycled 200,000 kilograms of plastic waste.

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #refinery #pipelines #ReOil #plasticrecycling #circulareconomy #syntheticoil #summer #sunshine #sunbeam #sunray #energy4betterlife'

b'Summer at OMV \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 3

Our refinery runs day and night \xe2\x80\x93 summer and winter. Except for maintenance and turnaround activities. These are then super-busy weeks, and people don\xe2\x80\x99t have time to pay too much attention to the weather. But one thing\xe2\x80\x99s for sure, with the sun on your face everything is easier.

#OMV #SchwechatRefinery #Schwechat #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #refinery #crane #summer #sunshine #sunbeam #sunray #energy4betterlife'

b'Summer at OMV \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 2

While the weather in Austria\xe2\x80\x99s Weinviertel is moderate compared to Siberia or Abu Dhabi, we have still seen lots of seasons in our 6 decades of producing oil and gas here. Still, summer remains our favorite.

#OMV #Weinviertel #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #oilfield #drillingrig #oilplatform #onshore #summer #sunshine #sunbeam #sunray #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'Summer at OMV \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 1

Summer has finally arrived in Weinviertel in Austria! For the oil and gas we produce there, the seasons do not matter. But as the name suggests, Weinviertel is also known for its vineyards. And the more sun, the sweeter the output. 

#OMV #Weinviertel #Austria #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #oilfield #drillingrig #oilplatform #onshore #summer #sunshine #sunbeam #sunray #countryside #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'We are at the OMV Burghausen Refinery, where the upper parts of the new isobutene columns have been placed and welded onto the lower parts already in situ. All in preparation for the new ISO-C4 plant, which is expected to come on stream in fall this year. \n\n#OMV #BurghausenRefinery #Burghausen #Germany #energy #petrochemicals #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #downstreamoil #column #isoc4 #isobutene #energy4betterlife'

b'This giant rose recently at the Burghausen Refinery \xe2\x80\x93 60 m high and 4 m across. It took a great team performance to realize the column lift for the new ISO-C4 plant, which will produce high-purity isobutene: a base for manufacturing glues, grease or other chemicals such as antioxidants, also used in the production of vitamin C.\n\n#OMV #BurghausenRefinery #Burghausen #Germany #energy #petrochemicals #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #downstreamoil #column #isoc4 #isobutene #energy4betterlife'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s not only the skyline of our Burghausen refinery that gained a recent addition with the new isobutene column. The refinery itself is also taking another major step forward in its petrochemical strategy with the new ISO-C4 plant.\n\n#OMV #BurghausenRefinery #Burghausen #Germany #energy #petrochemicals #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #downstreamoil #skyline #crane #column #isoc4 #isobutene #Prangl #energy4betterlife'

b'It was high-precision work to mount the column of our new ISO-C4 plant at the OMV Burghausen Refinery. After all, it is 30 meters long and weighs 150 metric tons. \n#OMV #BurghausenRefinery #Burghausen #Germany #energy #petrochemicals #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #downstreamoil #crane #column #ISOC4 #isobutene #Prangl #Felbermayr #energy4betterlife'

b'In a \xe2\x80\x9cheavy lift\xe2\x80\x9d visible far beyond the refinery area, huge cranes have placed a new column in the OMV Burghausen Refinery. The column is part of the new ISO-C4 plant, a EUR 64 mn investment in our petrochemicals business.\n\n#OMV #BurghausenRefinery #Burghausen #Germany #energy #petrochemicals#oilandgas #oilandgaslife #downstream #downstreamoil #crane #column #ISOC4 #isobutene #Prangl #Felbermayr #energy4betterlife'

b'Let\xe2\x80\x99s get to know Borealis, a leading petrochemical producer, in which OMV recently took over a 75% share. \nThis is the Borealis plant in Burghausen, Germany. It has a total capacity of around 560,000 metric tons a year. The plastic raw materials produced here are processed into fibers and films, for example, which are then used to make household items, packaging for food, transportation, medical applications, cleaning agents and cosmetics bottles. \n#OMV #Borealis #Burghausen #Germany #plant #petrochemicals #downstream #granules #plasticgranules #energy4betterlife #keepdiscovering'

b'Let\xe2\x80\x99s get to know Borealis, a leading petrochemical producer, in which OMV recently took over a 75% share. 
The Borealis cracker plant in Stenungsund, Sweden is one of the most flexible in Europe. It produces naphtha, ethane, propane and butane. But the main products at this site are ethylene and propylene \xe2\x80\x93 used as raw materials in the cable and pipe markets in particular.

#OMV #Borealis #Stenungsund #Sweden #plant #petrochemicals #downstream #naphtha #ethane #propane #butane #ethylene #propylene #energy4betterlife #keepdiscovering'

b'Let\xe2\x80\x99s get to know Borealis, a leading petrochemical producer, in which OMV recently took over a 75% share. \nWith annual polyolefin production capacity of around 1 million metric tons, the Borealis plant at Schwechat, Austriais one of the most important and modern plastics production sites in Europe. Since as far back as the 1960s, the plant has produced polypropylene and polyethylene \xe2\x80\x93 key raw materials for the plastics industry. \n#OMV #Borealis #Schwechat #Austria #plant #petrochemicals #downstream #polypropylene #polyethylene #energy4betterlife #keepdiscovering'

b'Let\xe2\x80\x99s get to know Borealis, a leading petrochemical producer, in which OMV recently took over a 75% share. \nThe Linz Borealis plant is located in the Linz chemical park in Austria. In addition to producing melamine, fertilizers and nitrogen, the site is home to Borealis Innovation Headquarters (IHQ). #OMV #Borealis #Linz #Austria #plant #petrochemicals #downstream #melamine #fertilizers #energy4betterlife #keepdiscovering'

b'Let\xe2\x80\x99s get to know Borealis, a leading petrochemical producer, in which OMV recently took over a 75% share. 
In its plant in Piesteritz, Germany, Borealis produces around 90,000 metric tons of high-quality melamine a year. Most of the melamine produced worldwide goes to the wood-based panel industry. It is also commonly used in the construction, automotive and furniture industries.

#OMV #Borealis #Piesteritz #Germany #plant #petrochemicals #downstream #melamine #energy4betterlife #keepdiscovering'

b"It's 466 steps to the top floor of the OMV Head Office. Known as the Skylounge, we usually use it for large meetings or press conferences. Currently only a select few can enjoy the view from there. But we will be back soon and we're looking forward to it. :play_button_selector: Read more: bit.ly/omv-headoffice \n#OMV #OMVHeadoffice #COVID19 #coronapandemic #stayhome #Austria #ViertelZwei #Viertel2 #Krieau #Trabrennstra\xc3\x9fe #energy #oilandgas #office #officetower #glasstower #henkeschreieck #architecture #glass #reflections #energy4betterlife"

b'The OMV Head Office comprises two buildings \xe2\x80\x93 \xe2\x80\x9cHoch Zwei\xe2\x80\x9d in the back and \xe2\x80\x9cPlus Zwei\xe2\x80\x9d in the front. Even though Hoch Zwei is the bigger building, Plus Zwei is currently the hotspot as our IT colleagues located there. Despite \xe2\x80\x93 or maybe because of \xe2\x80\x93 the coronavirus lockdown, several of them are physically present to keep the systems running. A big thank you from us! :play_button_selector: Read more: bit.ly/omv-headoffice \n#OMV #OMVHeadoffice #COVID19 #coronapandemic #stayhome #Austria #ViertelZwei #Viertel2 #Krieau #Trabrennstra\xc3\x9fe #energy #oilandgas #office #officetower #glasstower #henkeschreieck #architecture #glass #reflections #sunray #sun #energy4betterlife'

b'In normal times, around 1,900 people from 54 different countries work in the OMV head office. Usually it gets quite busy there, especially as people arrive in the morning. Not so these days, when most of the staff is still staying home to stay safe. :play_button_selector: Read more: bit.ly/omv-headoffice\n\n#OMV #OMVHeadoffice #COVID19 #coronapandemic #stayhome #Austria #ViertelZwei #Viertel2 #Krieau #Trabrennstra\xc3\x9fe #energy #oilandgas #office #officetower #glasstower #henkeschreieck #architecture #glass #reflections #energy4betterlife'

b'We moved into the OMV head office in 2009. In all that time its 44,000 m\xc2\xb2 office space has never been as empty as it is now, with most of our staff working from home to stay safe during the pandemic. :play_button_selector: Read more: bit.ly/omv-headoffice\n\n#OMV #OMVHeadoffice #COVID19 #coronapandemic #stayhome #Austria #ViertelZwei #Viertel2 #Krieau #Trabrennstra\xc3\x9fe #energy #oilandgas #office #officetower #glasstower #henkeschreieck #architecture #glass #reflections #energy4betterlife'

b'This is the OMV head office, located in Vienna\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cViertel Zwei\xe2\x80\x9d area. Usually a lively spot with the Wiener Prater and the Vienna University of Economics and Business around the corner. But these days it is quite empty due to #COVID19. :play_button_selector: Read more: bit.ly/omv-headoffice\n\n#OMV #OMVHeadoffice #COVID19 #coronapandemic #stayhome #Austria #ViertelZwei #Viertel2 #Krieau #Trabrennstra\xc3\x9fe #energy #oilandgas #office #officetower #glasstower #henkeschreieck #architecture #glass #reflections #sunray #sun #energy4betterlife'

b'The installation of the OMV Petrom Hurezani gas treatment system in Romania took 15 months to reach mechanical completion with peaks of 200 workers on site. But due to real focus on Safety First, more than 500,000 man-hours have been recorded with no LTIs (Lost Time Injuries) meaning that no work-related accidents or incidents happened during the completion of that project.\n\n#OMV #OMVPetrom #Hurezani #Romania #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #gasfield #pipelines #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'The Hurezani gas treatment facility reflects latest industry standards. Its upgrade increases energy efficiency and contributes to the reduction of greenhouse gas emission, while ensuring safe operations for the infrastructure. \n#OMV #OMVPetrom #Hurezani #Romania #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #gasfield #pipelines #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'1.4 million homes in Romania are provided with energy thanks to the passionate people of OMV Petrom at the Hurezani Gas Hub. The gas treatment system allows delivery of up to 6 million standard cubic meters of natural gas per day. \n#OMV #OMVPetrom #Hurezani #Romania #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #gasfield #pipelines #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'The Hurezani gas hub is located in Gorj County, Romania. It serves four of the most important gas producing fields in OMV Petrom\xe2\x80\x99s portfolio, allowing Romania to benefit from reliable gas supply.\n\n#OMV #OMVPetrom #Hurezani #Romania #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #gasfield #pipelines #oilfieldphotography #energy4betterlife'

b'The Colorful World of #Geology \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 5

No wonder our geologists love rocks - they come in a variety of shapes and colors you would not expect to find in nature.  As captured here by Ralph Hinsch in Petra (Jordan). More about 'The Colorful World of Geology" on the OMV Blog! :play_button_selector: Read more: bit.ly/omv-geology

#OMV #Jordan #Petra #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #geology #stones #rocks #geologyrocks #sedimentology #sandstone #oxides #energy4betterlife'

b'The Colorful World of #Geology \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 4

This beautiful formation can be found at White Island, New Zealand. It is the crater lake of an active volcano, captured by Carey Mills. On the bottom right of the picture, you see a stranded delta. :play_button_selector: Read more: bit.ly/omv-geology

#OMV #NewZealand #WhiteIsland #energy #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #upstream #geology #stones #rocks #crater #craterlake #volcano #geologyrocks #sedimentology #energy4betterlife'

b'The Colorful World of #Geology \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 3

Rocks can have many different compositions and physical characteristics, which tell our geologists an interesting story. The picture at hand was captured by Eugenia-Alexandra Oteleanu and shows a foraminifer. It is 1.5 cm and from the Eocene limestone quarry in Bughea de Jos (Romania). :play_button_selector: Read more: bit.ly/omv-geology

b'The Colorful World of #Geology \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 1

In places where chemical elements, such as iron or sulfur, come loose from existing rock or have replaced other elements, a rock changes color. In an interplay with erosion, this can result in intense color variations. Just like captured by Liam Holt in Potash Ponds (USA). :play_button_selector: Read more: bit.ly/omv-geology

b'#Numbers \xe2\x80\x93 Episode 4

When drilling for oil and gas, you need drill pipes or casings. The number on the pipes indicates the length of the pipeline \xe2\x80\x93 5.94 meters in this picture. That\xe2\x80\x99s quite a short one as they usually come in lengths of around 12 meters.
